Package org.wmn4j.mir

Class PatternBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.mir.PatternBuilder
  • public final class PatternBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for building Pattern instances.

    Instances of this class are not thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PatternBuilder()
      Constructor that creates an empty builder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(DurationalBuilder builder)
      Adds the given durational builder to the default voice in this builder.
      void addLabel​(java.lang.String label)
      Adds the given label to this builder.
      void addToVoice​(int voice, DurationalBuilder durationalBuilder)
      Adds the given durational builder to the voice with the given number.
      Pattern build()
      Returns a pattern instance with the contents set into this builder.
      boolean isMonophonic()
      Returns true if this builder only has monophonic contents, that is, there is only single voice in the pattern and there are no simultaneously sounding notes set in the contents of this builder.
      void setName​(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name of the pattern to be built.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PatternBuilder

        public PatternBuilder()
        Constructor that creates an empty builder.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(DurationalBuilder builder)
        Adds the given durational builder to the default voice in this builder. This method is intended for constructing patterns with a single voice, the addToVoice method can be used for constructing polyphonic patterns with multiple voices.
        Parameters:
        builder - the durational builder that is added to the default voice in this builder

      • addToVoice

        public void addToVoice​(int voice,
                       DurationalBuilder durationalBuilder)
        Adds the given durational builder to the voice with the given number. This method is intended for constructing polyphonic patterns, the add method can be used for constructing monophonic patterns.
        Parameters:
        voice - the number of the voice to which the durational builder is added
        durationalBuilder - the durational builder that is added to the given voice in this builder

      • isMonophonic

        public boolean isMonophonic()
        Returns true if this builder only has monophonic contents, that is, there is only single voice in the pattern and there are no simultaneously sounding notes set in the contents of this builder.
        Returns:
        true if this builder has monophonic contents

      • setName

        public void setName​(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of the pattern to be built.
        Parameters:
        name - the non-null name of the pattern to be built

      • addLabel

        public void addLabel​(java.lang.String label)
        Adds the given label to this builder.
        Parameters:
        label - the label to be added to this builder.

      • build

        public Pattern build()
        Returns a pattern instance with the contents set into this builder.
        Returns:
        a pattern instance with the contents set into this builder
